message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a competitive price of $200. I believe it offers excellent value, even at that price.
Hi Alice, $200 is a bit steep for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $80.  Let me know if you're willing to negotiate.
Hi Bob, thanks for your interest. $200 might have been a little high, but $80 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $140?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $140 is still more than I'm comfortable paying. I'm sticking to my offer of $80. Let me know if you're willing to accept that.
